resources.string: All of your contacts have been removed from your phone.
100 randomly generated contacts have been added to your phone.
100 \'zeroed\' contacts have been added to overwrite memory on your phone.
This utility will display the SSL certificate information for any HTTPS enabled website.
You must enter an https:// site address
What language should In The Clear display?
Enter the mobile phone number(s), separated by comma, of who you want to alert via SMS
Enter your name to be displayed to configured friends.
Wipe Contents of Selected Folders on SD Card
Select the folders that will be wiped when you press the PANIC! button
We couldn\'t access your settings. Please check your preferences.
There was a problem saving your preferences.
You do not have any friends configured. Please check your preferences.
Enter the message you want to shout to your configured friends.
WARNING: THIS WILL REMOVE THE ACTUAL DATA FROM YOUR PHONE.\n\nSelect one or more data types below to wipe.
Wipe Content from Selected Folders on SD Card:
You have not selected any folders.

InTheClear is a mobile app designed to help improve your safety in difficult situations. It does this with three main features that you must configure.

Panic!, Shout & Wipe

This wizard will walk you through the setup process for these features, and ensure your mobile is ready for an emergency situation.

string-array.name: WIZARD_TEXT
string-array.item: If you\'d like In the Clear to include information about yourself when activated, you can configure that now.
Now we will make sure your phone is configured properly.
Enter a mobile number of your choosing below to test Shout! SMS sending. Make sure you\'re able to verify delivery with the recipient!

When activated, Shout! will optionally send your location information along with your alert message. This information could be essential for your safety, even if your phone does not have GPS. Enable location permissions below.
Enter in one or more phone numbers, separated by a comma, to send the alert to, and a short alert message to send.
Wipe can be set up to erase or overwrite your phone\'s existing data when activated. It requires permissions to access your contact list or SMS database to do so.
Choose how you\'d like Wipe! to work below. Caution-- erasing or overwriting data is an unrecoverable action, so choose your setup wisely.
Your configuration of the Panic! settings are now complete. You may run this wizard again, or launch preferences from setup screen to change your settings.

resources.string: It seems like your message went through. Please check with the recipient to make sure.
This is the location data we could access:
Great! Seems like we can access your local data.
